nodes.text: Barriss Offee's Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor

Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee piloted a teal Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor during the Battle of Umbara. During the battle, she flew alongside fellow Padawan Ahsoka Tano. Her onboard R-series astromech droid was purple with pink plating. The ship itself had blue markings.
